metadata.synopsis: When entering the torture class room in the grotto. Shadowheart reflects on her experiences.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 0. Recruit Shadowheart1. Go to the shar grotto2. Enter the torture class room

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: I... I think I might have hurt people here. Learned how to break their bodies, their spirits...
0.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH abandoned Shar. Quietly horrified. Grasping at a fragment of memory that suggests she once tortured people in this place

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Quiet in here now. But it wasn't always so. Screams rang off these walls. I swear I can almost hear them.
2.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH abandoned Shar. Quietly horrified. Grasping at a fragment of memory that suggests she once tortured people in this place

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I learned how to inflict pain here, for Lady Shar. I can't remember the faces... but I think I can still hear the screams.
1.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar. Thoughtful. Grasping at something stirred from her memory while in a torture training room

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: A disquietening place... but you must inflict pain in order to end pain. Lady Shar's embrace can soothe all mortal torments.
3.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar. T Thoughtful. Grasping at something stirred from her memory while in a torture training room
